text: Jorge Vargas Gonzalez (Pichilemu, February 8, 1967) is a Chilean politician, singer, composer. He was the mayor of Pichilemu from 1997 to 2007, when he was fired due to legal reasons. == Biography == In November 7, 1998, Jorge Vargas left the Mayoralty of Pichilemu for almost 3 months because of false medical licenses.El Mercurio.com In 2007, he was arrested because he stole money from the Municipality. He used money from the Health service to make a calendar with photos of himself,Pichilemu: Querella por mal uso de fondos municipales, El Mercurio, May 3, 2003 in a case named Calendarios. Later was arrested his successor, Victor Rojas, and then the successor of this latter, Marcelo Cabrera. ==Music== Vargas has produced himself an album named Heredero de Tu Amor, in 2004.Preso alcalde de Pichilemu acusado de inducci√≥n al falso testimonio in La Cuarta He produced a song of the same name, receiving high airplay in Chilean radios. He also manages a radio in the city named Radio Somos Pichilemu, since early 2008. ==References== == Other websites == *Pichilemu Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean politicians Category:People from Pichilemu Category:Chilean composers
title: Jorge Vargas (politician)
